body.description: Enhance your audio experience with the Monoprice 5 Pairs of High-Quality Gold Plated Speaker Banana Plugs, Open Screw Type. These speaker connectors offer seamless connectivity, ensuring your sound system operates at its best. Versatility is at the core of these plugs, as they effortlessly accommodate bare wire, spades, and other banana plugs, granting you the freedom to customize your setup. Compatible with 12 to 18 AWG speaker wires, they provide a reliable link between your speakers and audio equipment. The thoughtful design incorporates color-coded black and red rings, simplifying the polarity setup and reducing the risk of mistakes during installation. The secure and positive contact with binding posts guarantees optimal signal transfer and minimizes signal loss, resulting in crisp and clear audio output. Crafted from corrosion-resistant, 24K gold-plated brass, these plugs promise long-lasting durability and efficient performance, even after extended use. Each order contains an impressive FIVE pairs, amounting to a total of 10 plugs, ensuring you have an ample supply for your audio connections. Elevate your sound system with these Monoprice speaker banana plugs, and revel in the improved sound quality and hassle-free installation they bring to your audio setup.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Monoprice Gold Plated Speaker Banana Plugs Banana plugs make speaker installation a breeze. They are designed for use with amplifiers or speakers that use traditional binding posts. Not only is it easier to make the connection on the back of your amp, it is safer, with no chance of stray wire strands creating a short across contacts. These high quality plugs are the open screw type and can accept bare wire, spades, or other banana plugs. They are sized to fit speaker wire from 12 to 18 AWG. Each pair comes with one plug color coded red and the other coded black, for easy polarity identification. The plug body is made of brass, which is then plated with gold to help prevent corrosion and ensure smooth connections. This multi-pack includes five pairs of plugs, perfect for connecting the satellite and center channel speakers in a 5.1 channel setup. Features: Can accept bare wire, spades, or other banana plugs Can accept 12 to 18 AWG speaker wires Color coded black/red rings for maintaining proper polarity Secure, positive contact with binding posts Corrosion resistant, 24K gold plated brass plug Each order includes five pairs (10 plugs total)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product...works as advertised...
reviews.reviewText: Home theater speaker connections....best value....great quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally banana plugs that actually work and are easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: I can't say enough about how happy I am with these. very easy to install the wire end and close/open. Fit tightly into the binding posts on all my equipment. Had given up on using plugs until now. Great AND cheap!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the best but good value
reviews.reviewText: A set of five pairs, for $10? That's a deal!No instructions -> Figuring them out isn't an obvious thing (given the sizable number of reviews/pix using the plug-stacking side hole, to mount the wires):It's pretty easy, checkout Ealan Osborne's "monoprice" YouTube video tip (strip _very little_: you want ~ 1/4" of bare wire sticking out past the end of the barrel, splaying out the individual wires across the barrel top, and avoid crossing them into the threads, then screw the plug into the barrel), and Barbara Chambers recommendation to _use two pairs of pliers_ to tighten the coarse thread connection down to _firmly_ grip those splayed wires.If you've got too much wire overlapped, and it's tearing the spayed wires off, strip back further, trim the end and try it again.You may have to attempt it a few times but that combo gets it done.I've got some old thick-insulation monster 12ga wire, that wouldn't even fit up the barrel, so I simply stripped enough to traverse the barrel + 1/4". Easy peasy.Just bought another set. :D

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to make Speaker Connection
reviews.reviewText: Super simple to prepare: back off the screw end of the plug, insert wire/cable, re-tighten the screw end. That's it. Insert into banana plug receptacle on the speaker and/or amp and you're good to go. Only way to go with larger gauge speaker wire/cable. Good price for 5(?)pair...6 pair would've been ideal.

reviews.reviewText: Works good. Not the best, materials ok, however, seems nice for the price. There are better clips out there. However, they may also cost more as well.

reviews.reviewText: Not much to be said other than these are really good. The quality of the product is flawless and I loved how easy it was to connect wire to them. No soldering mess!

reviews.reviewTitle: ケーブルが直角になる
reviews.reviewText: よく見てないから悪いんだけど、ケーブルを横から指すので、直角に折れ曲がりアンプに抜き差しする際ちょっと使いにくい。多分これはもう買わないと思う。(別に見つけたのを使ってるし。^^;）てっきり中でねじ止めかと思ってたんだけどなぁ。それ以外は今んところ問題ないんだけど...。
